pageContext.claim: “The internet is totally controlled by a few people and they make it very difficult. I mean, it's a miracle that I won, that people... It is a miracle because it's so fixed....But they're doing anybody on the right, anybody, any Republican, any conservative Republican is censored. And look at the horrible things they say on the left, they say things that are shocking. I mean, shocking, how horrible. And they're not censored, they're not talked about, they're able to go ahead and do whatever they want to do, say whatever they want.”
pageContext.analysis: There's no evidence that the media or the social media companies such as Google or Facebook did anything to thwart Trump's chances at being elected -- or are trying to rig the upcoming election. Ever the conspiracy theorist, Trump constantly comes up with new ways "Big Tech" is trying to undermine him, even as he relies on social media to communicate with his supporters.
